奮不顧身.definition: to dash on bravely with no thought of personal safety (idiom); undaunted by dangers; regardless of perils

奮力.definition: to do everything one can; to spare no effort; to strive

奮勇.definition: dauntless; to summon up courage and determination; using extreme force of will

奮戰.definition: to fight bravely; (fig.) to struggle; to work hard

奮發.definition: to rouse to vigorous action; energetic mood

奮發圖強.definition: to work energetically for prosperity (of the country)

奮筆疾書.definition: to write at a tremendous speed

奮袂.definition: to roll up one's sleeves for action

奮起.definition: to rise vigorously; a spirited start

奮起湖.definition: Fenchihu, town in Chiayi County, Taiwan

奮起直追.definition: to catch up vigorously; to set off in hot pursuit
